class.name: DetectObject
class.description: Detect objects using vision (color-based or VLM). Outputs target_pose in map frame.

class.name: PickObject
class.description: Pick up an object at the specified pose using the manipulator. Requires target_pose input parameter.

class.name: PlaceObject
class.description: Place an object at the specified pose using the manipulator. Requires target_pose input parameter.
